Title: Relates to enacting the New York state federal worker banking assistance act
Summary: Enacts the "New York state federal worker banking assistance act" to require the superintendent of financial services to take into account efforts of banking institutions to modify terms on existing loans, extend new loans with low- to no-interest rates, or the waiving of fees to help furloughed federal employees during a shutdown when assessing the record of such institutions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to enacting the "New York state federal worker banking assistance act"
